testcase.name: Verify with the Plan for uprooting current Plantation details
testcase.system-out: Given the user has entered a"Admin".........................................passed And the user has entered1 a"P@ssw0rd".......................................passed And User click on the LogIn button..........................................passed Then the User navigated to the home page....................................passed Then click on the dashoboard menu as Activities.............................passed And click on the Underplanting menu screen..................................passed Then check with the From date selection validations details.................passed Then check with the Click on the search button from the Underplanting screen.passed And check with the Click on the Initiate Underplanting action button........passed Then Check with the Select Farmer search input details......................passed And check with the Select plot from the underplanting screen................passed Then check with the plot details by Total Plot area ip details..............passed And check with the Plot details by Total Plam area ip details...............passed Then check with the Expected month of Underplanting tress Date selection....passed And check with the Address one input details................................passed Then check with the Landmark field input details............................passed And check with the file upload application for underplanting................passed Then check with the Underplanting reason dropdown selection.................passed And check with the Approx height of current tress details...................passed And check with the Harvesting method dropdown selection details.............passed And check with the Plan for uprooting current plantation details............passed And Check with the Clicking on the Save butoon details......................passed
